item.title: Books With Messy Family Dynamics and AAPI Histories
item.description: There's a more realistic Hawai'i, the life of a troubled Indian American teenager, and two sisters in turn-of-the-millennium Singapore.

item.title: Read This GATSBY Take Even if You Didn’t Like Gatsby
item.description: This is the magical historical fiction reimagining that saved me from being a complete GATSBY hater, written by one of my favorite authors.

item.title: Agatha Christie’s Fingerprints Are On Everything
item.description: More than 100 years after Agatha Christie's first book was published, her influence can still be seen in mystery stories of all kinds today.
